entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Saint Andrews
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:51 AM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Saint Andrews
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:09 AM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Point Lepreau 05:00 AM AST Thursday 12 January 2023
Temperature: -9.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 55 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -16.6°C
Wind: NNE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along the coast late this evening and overnight. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain at times heavy or snow. High 10.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain at times heavy in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along the coast in the afternoon. High 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 12 January 2023
